fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 58.2/61.1/64.0% of Attack (2 hits).
fixed_skill.name: Double Fangs

innate_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Zio

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. Increase accuracy to inflict Shock on foes with less than 70% HP by 40%.
passive_skill.name: Beast Guardian Statue

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. Increase accuracy to inflict Shock on foes with less than 70% HP by 45%.
passive_skill.name: Beast Guardian Statue I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
